parameters.rootl: a numeric vector of root lengths
parameters.conc: a numeric vector of concentrations of ferulic acid

reference:
The data are part of a study to investigate the joint action
of phenolic acids on root growth inhibition of perennial ryegrass (Lolium perenne L).
title: Effect of ferulic acid on growth of ryegrass
format: A data frame with 24 observations on the following 2 variables.
